body.name: Home Design 3D [Download]
features: In 2D, you can draw rooms, create openings, and now add single and small walls.
You can just as easily change the height or the thickness of the walls, the shape of the room itself, ...
By simply dragging/dropping, make your choice from among hundreds of objects and pieces of joinery proposed and change both the interior and exterior of your home.
Upgrade to 3D mode and get the most out of your project. Thanks to its all-new 3D engine, you can take a look at an impressive photo-realistic preview of your project.
Choose from the textures to customize your project either by double tapping or with a simple drag & drop.
body.description: Home Design 3D is that perfect balance between ease of use and extensive features. With Home Design 3D, designing and changing your home has never been so intuitive and quick. Whether you want to redecorate, redesign or create the home of your dreams, Home Design 3D is the perfect app for you!System Requirements:Supported OS: [Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows XP]Processor: Intel 5 ou équivalentRAM: 2 GoHard Disk: 330 MoVideo Card: DX9 ou OpenGL 2.0

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars not that easy to figure out
reviews.reviewText: not that easy to figure out... it can't do a lot of things... limited in its scope... there is no way to print your design... how can you take it to the store if you can't print it... would not recommend

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars real easy to
reviews.reviewText: had a blast, real easy to learn

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bad, unsuportted software
reviews.reviewText: Bogus download. 0 support from author and support from amazon says they can't fix and that numerous others have filed complaints. Had hard time getting refund and even when I did it came with a stern warning about no refunds for software. I'm hoping amazon meant no refunds for software that actually works and not bogus, non working, can't be fixed, not even gonna try software.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Unbelievably bad - shame to both SoftwareCo and Amazon
reviews.reviewText: Borders on fraud. I cannot take my ipad created project that I successfully exported and emailed to my PC. There is zero functionality to open a file from a saved location! Seems like other users having same problem. While the iPad version is 'fine' I had wanted a PC version for the as-described on website 'expanded features' and dexterity with a mouse. But I can't even open the file I spent hours on in the iPad version!!! I can't believe this kind of garbage can be sold through a retailer like Amazon. Other reviews of this product are just as bad as mine. I want a refund and will be exploring alllll my options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Read the reviews!! Software did not work, ...
reviews.reviewText: Read the reviews!! Software did not work, crashes every time I load the program. No support and is non-refundable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2016
reviews.reviewText: Buyer beware, you're not getting what you paid for nor think you were getting. Many thumbs down.Mediocre design elements like stair cases, doors, wall elements in open areas among other elements that fall short of the basics.Its like many features don't even work, like paint walls doesn't work, if you do not have a mouse there is no way to increase or decrease screen resolution.Can't do Two Story Design.Worse- there is NO WAY to save you project to pdf to email or anything, nor even print.You are not getting what they say you do on their website and you get ZERO help its like they don't care

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2015
reviews.reviewText: Installed on Windows 7 and it crashes while starting!!! I want my money back!
